changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FORECAST_LOCATION', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FORECAST_LOCATION', 'FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION', 'FORECAST_LOCATION';
